A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Please stop comparing it to Empire Strikes Back. Empire had surprises and antithetical plot elements to keep the audience involved. This movie is one impossible situation after another\, each of which is somehow escaped by all of the protagonists. Kill somebody important for god's sake\, would you? The endless\, pointless action made it feel a bit like attack of the clones\, frankly. Not exactly the sort of film one would want to be compared to. I also got the impression that Disney has completed its Marvel-ization of the franchise. Impossible situation... protags escape impossible situation... oh look! - another impossible situation... repeat...
